transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello. Hello. Haan sir bataiye Rahul ji.
Executive: Arey.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye kya matlab kya problem aati hai sir aapne 96 wale helpline number pe call kiya hai.
Executive: Query nahi aa rahi thi main ye keh raha hu aapko.
Customer: Achcha query nahi aayi ek minute sir.
Customer: Aapne bola tha ki mujhe phone karna.
Executive: Haan sir maine bola sir mera number aapke paas hoga na sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Us number se call nahi kiya.
Customer: Ab mujhe proper pata hai abhi aapne bola STTP ETTP and industrial RO plant ka.
Executive: Aap batao na aap usme se ek query to batao ki ye aayi hai Rahul ji aapke paas.
Executive: Haan nahi main main check kar raha hu abhi.
Customer: Hmm. Main aapne bola isliye maine waha pe dhyan bhi diya par kya aaya yu keh raha hu aapse isliye main phone kiya maine kaha theek hai sir bas call bana dijiye.

Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Hello. Haan abhi dekhiye industrial reverse osmosis plant ka abhi just 14 minute pehle ka ek aaya hua hai.
Customer: Aap check kariye.
Executive: Hamare to nahi dikh raha hai.
Customer: Aap check kariye sir recent pe jaaiye. Aap India mart open kariye.
Customer: Ye 50 LPH ka industrial nahi hota hai sir ye chota hai.
Executive: Sir ye ye 50 LPH ka hai.
Customer: Haan 50 LPH kaunsa sir industrial hota hai?
Executive: To phir kitna LPH ka hota hai sir?
Customer: Ye 1000 LPH se upar hoga na wo industrial hota hai sir.
Executive: Okay. Haan.

Executive: And ye air bowler machine hai sir?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Air bowler machine bhi deal karte hai aap? Uske alawa?
Customer: Haan hai isme koi dikh to nahi rahi industrial air blower hai ye Tamil Nadu air bowler machine air bowler machine ka teen ghante pehle ki aayi hui hai. 2.5 pieces ki 6000 watt 600 watt. Nahi nahi sir aap maine jo inquiry di hai na nahi nahi wo sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir main samajh raha hu theek hai sir. Dekho kya hai ki aapke yaha product teen ke alawa bhi kai sare product yaha paid hai.
Executive: Wo hata do aap bhale wo hata do bhale.
Customer: Okay theek hai to aap sir usko ek end sir dekho aap past list mein ek baar aaiye.
Customer: RO plant ki inquiry di hai na sir jo maine bola hai sir ek sir sir aap wo meri ek baat suniye sir aap dekhiye abhi do ghante just pehle ek leads aayi hui thi theek hai wo sold out ho gayi hai RO water plant 1000 LPH ka tha sir.
Customer: Are kya batao aapko.
Executive: Aapne usko bhi miss kar diya. Sir main samajh raha hu aap bol rahe ho RO water plant industrial RO water plant tha. Ye 1000 LPH ka aaya tha. Abhi just do ghante pehle ki aayi thi. Ab ek baar aisa kaam kariye main aapko link send kar raha hu aap video call pe main aapko dikhata hu.
Customer: Are sir abhi do na aap mujhe main ye keh raha hu abhi inquiry ho to abhi do na aap chalo wo hua jo hua.
Executive: Abhi. Haan abhi koi hai?
Customer: Ek minute rukiye sir.

Executive: 100 LPH ka aapko send karu?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: 100 LPH ka 100 LPH ka. 100 100 nahi 1000 se upar ho to baat karo sir otherwise to koi matlab nahi hai usme yu pareshan hona.

Aap karo sir dikhao to WhatsApp pe. Nahi nahi meri baat suniye sir. Dekho to sir 1000 ke upar dekho sir aapko
Executive: Chahiye to aapko near about yaha pe proper aapko open karna hoga IndiaMART ko. Theek hai aisa nahi ki sir aapne ek baar 19 tarikh ko open kiye phir ek baar 20 tarikh ko open kiye aap ek baar open karo aapko turant leads mil jayengi. Agar 1000 LPH ko aapko chahiye to proper yaha pe near about 8 se 10 baar open karna hoga phir aapko leads dikhegi. Theek hai kyunki dekho abhi just do ghante pehle hi 1000 LPH ki aayi thi wo sold out ho gayi kyunki sir kafi sare jo seller hai wo proper yaha pe active rehte hain. Din mein 10 se 20 baar open karke dekhte hain ki ha leads aa rahi hai ki nahi aayi hai.
Customer: Haan wo samajh gaya main samajh raha hu theek hai theek hai sir theek hai bas yahi sunna tha. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Wants buyleads above 1000 LPH.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and shared available buyleads.

- Explained the need to open IndiaMART frequently.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, industrial ro plant
